trustfund:
TF035883-KAZAKSTAN - OIL AND GAS,TF034419-ECA REGION - PETROLUM AND
            PROJECT WORK,TF033097-RUSSIA - ENERGY,TF032455-AZERBAIJAN - OIL & GAS,TF023074-PHRD-NATURAL GAS SYSTEM RECONSTRUCTION

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objectives of the Petroleum
            Technical Assistance Project are: 1) to accelerate foreign
            private investment and financial participation in petroleum
            exploration and production; b) to strengthen petroleum
            sub-sector institutions through development of petroleum
            legislation, training, and improvements in information
            systems; and c) to prepare investment projects in the
            petroleum sub-sector. The project will provide: 1) provision
            of resources to the State Oil Company of Azerbaijan Republic
            (SOCAR) to recruit financial, legal and technical advisors
            for: formulation and management of a project for the
            rehabilitation of the Guneshli field; exploration and
            development of other fields and construction of related
            infrastructure; legal studies on Caspian Sea boundary
            determination; development of an oil export pipeline; and
            petroleum licensing and exploration promotion; 2)
            development of a legislative and fiscal framework for
            petroleum exploration and production; 3) institutional
            strengthening of SOCAR through training, and introduction of
            information and communication systems; 4) detailed
            investment and restructuring studies of the older oil
            fields, gas processing facilities and oil export
            infrastructure improvements; 5) technical assistance for the
            Project Implementation Unit covering financial, procurement
            and project management services; and 6) an unallocated
            amount of US$1.0 million to cover additional project
            preparation activities and advisory services.
